channel.title: Tools on WebSnippet is a blog to share top quality open source resources for developers

item.title: How to Center in CSS
item.author: mirodil@websnippet.io (Mirodil)
item.description: Centering in CSS is a pain in the ass. There seems to be a gazillion ways to do it, depending on a variety of factors. This consolidates them and gives you the code you need for each situation.
